field.name: attendance_ids
field.eval: [ Command.clear(), Command.create({'dayofweek': '0', 'duration_hours': 15, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '1', 'duration_hours': 15, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '2', 'duration_hours': 15, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '3', 'duration_hours': 15, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '4', 'duration_hours': 15, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '5', 'duration_hours': 6, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), Command.create({'dayofweek': '6', 'duration_hours': 6, 'hour_from': 0, 'hour_to': 0}), ]
